name: Cut the Nut
description:
A hungry squirrel is just waiting to get nuts! A new game with 100 unique levels and lots of features!

In this fun casual new game "Cut the Nut" you will have to cut the rope correctly so that the squirrel won't be hungry.
But just feeding the squirrel is not enough, when you will cut the rope to bring the nut into the squirrel's mouth, you will have to collect in the way 3 stars. In the first levels it will be easy, but when you will reach the advanced levels more features will be added and that would make your mission much more difficult.

In addition to being a fun game, this game is a physics-based game that compatible with everyone and helps improve the way of thinking.
Enjoy.
